remarks: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the Cauchy filters for the metric.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement: cfilucfil3 $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( ( C e. ( Fil ` X ) /\ C e. ( CauFilU ` ( metUnif ` D ) ) ) <-> C e. ( CauFil ` D ) ) ) $.
